# Forgetful Slumber (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Witch Spells|Witch 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a few drops of river water)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 48

This spell acts as the *[[Deep Slumber (Spell)|deep slumber]]* spell, but only affects one creature of 10 Hit Dice or fewer. In addition, a creature affected by this spell awakens with no knowledge of the events that led to the spellâ€™s casting. The target loses all memory from the 5 minutes prior to falling asleep. No effect short of a *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]* or *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* can restore memories lost by this spell.
